attributes.action: bring a charde of Treason against the Government of the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the People wish to bring a charge of treason against the Government of Briton on the following charges

1:	For allowing the control of the Law within the kingdom of Great Briton and Northern Ireland to dictated by a foreign power by the signing over control of the kingdom to Europe without consultation with the people or parliament   

2:	By instigating Laws within the Kingdom to discriminate against the Indigenous Population in favour of foreign nationals 

3:	By the deliberate induction of the break-up of the Union by permitting regional Parliaments within the regions when excluding these privileges from the English Population

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
